ygData.subject: RE: Stein from Ogres
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know what level these Ogres are that carry the Crude Stein? ... From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@hotmail.com] Sent: Friday, August 06, 1999 7:24 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know what level these Ogres are that carry the Crude Stein?

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Friday, August 06, 1999 7:24 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Stein from Ogres


From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

Someone suggested getting a thief to steal the stein from the ogre guards.
Has anyone tried this yet and managed to get one? I'd take on the guards
myself, but I don't feel like screwing up my faction with the ogres -
they're the only ones I know of with certain molds that I need for my
blacksmithing. I'd buy a stein, (on Bertox) but everyone wants an outrageous
amount for one (they usually want enough cash to buy a rubicite chestplate
and a GZ). I know the stein is a pretty good item, but isn't that a little
much for it? Let's be a little realistic here now - I want one, but that's a
tad bit much for it!
